meanings.definition: A person or machine that plants seedlings or young plants in a new location.
meanings.sent1: The skilled transplanter carefully placed the young saplings in the fertile soil.
meanings.sent2: The farmer used a transplanter to move the seedlings to the larger field.
meanings.sent3: The robotic transplanter had a funny habit of humming while working in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The transplanter was like a gentle giant, delicately handling each plant with care.
meanings.sent5: Watching the transplanter at work was like witnessing a dance of nature and technology.

meanings.definition: A device used for transplanting plants.
meanings.sent1: The small transplanter made the task of moving plants much easier for the gardener.
meanings.sent2: The transplanter was a handy tool for relocating flowers to different pots.
meanings.sent3: The bright red transplanter stood out among the other gardening tools.
meanings.sent4: The transplanter gleamed in the sunlight, ready to assist in the garden work.
meanings.sent5: The efficient transplanter saved time and effort when replanting the garden.
